title: What can I get
content:
I have a rank of approx 3.9k(PESSAT)
What are my options ?

comments.body: What is the major difference between ec and rr campus?
Thats a story in its own.....I would suggest you to type faqs in pesu channel you will find your answers
not much, seniors who changed from ec to rr after 1 year say there is not that much difference.
